p: The acute toxicity study of methanol and ethanol extracts of T. leptobotrys showed no mortality or clinical signs of toxicity in each group of animals all through the fourteen days of study. At 2000â€‰mg/kg, rats showed no signs of changes in behavioral patterns or undesirable pathology or weight loss ( Table 3). Ethanol and methanol extracts of T. leptobotrys can be classified as category 5 and are considered to be nontoxic by the oral route [ 23].
